rules_text:
Choose an additional cost as you cast this spell [i](choose only one)[/i]–
+ {G} – Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
+ {1}{G} – Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
+ {3}{G}{G} – Create a 1/1 green Snake creature token, a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, and a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.
